pages.title: Salt Ore
pages.text: $(l)Depth: y = 60 - 80$()$(br2)Rock salt can be harvested near sea level anywhere in the overworld.$(br2)While digging up rock salt whenever you find it is a reasonable early source of salt, evaporating salt water is the more sustainable option.

pages.title: A Pinch of Salt
pages.text: Salt is a cornerstone of the culinary arts, beloved for its near magical ability to make even the most vile substances palatable. A pinch is really all you need for most dishes.
